description: Create a unified payment provider interface that abstracts Stripe, PayPal, and Square APIs. Include provider factory pattern, common payment models, and error handling strategy.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Provider interface supports charge, refund, and void operations; 2. Factory pattern selects provider based on configuration; 3. Common PaymentResult model returned by all providers; 4. Provider-specific errors mapped to unified error codes; 5. Unit tests achieve 90% coverage

description: Build PayPal payment provider implementation with Orders API v2, webhook signature verification, and dispute handling support.
acceptance_criteria: 1. PayPal Orders API v2 integration complete; 2. Support for capture and authorize flows; 3. Webhook signature verification implemented; 4. Dispute notifications handled; 5. Sandbox and production environment support

description: Create centralized webhook handler for processing payment provider callbacks with idempotency, retry logic, and event persistence.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Webhook endpoint accepts callbacks from all providers; 2. Signature verification for each provider type; 3. Idempotency key prevents duplicate processing; 4. Failed webhooks queued for retry; 5. All events persisted for audit

description: Build admin dashboard for transaction monitoring, refund processing, and payment analytics with role-based access.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Transaction list with filtering and search; 2. Refund initiation workflow; 3. Payment analytics charts; 4. Role-based access control; 5. Export to CSV/PDF

description: Implement OAuth 2.0 authorization server with support for authorization code flow with PKCE, client credentials flow, and refresh token rotation.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Authorization code flow with PKCE implemented per RFC 7636; 2. Client credentials flow for service-to-service auth; 3. Refresh token rotation with automatic revocation; 4. Token introspection endpoint available; 5. All flows pass OWASP security checklist

description: Build MFA system supporting TOTP authenticator apps, SMS verification, and email backup codes with recovery flow.
acceptance_criteria: 1. TOTP setup with QR code generation; 2. SMS verification via Twilio; 3. Email backup codes generation; 4. Recovery flow for lost devices; 5. MFA enforcement policies per user role

description: Build secure session management with Redis-backed session store, concurrent session limits, and forced logout capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Redis session store with TTL; 2. Concurrent session limit configurable; 3. Force logout by session or user; 4. Session activity tracking; 5. Geographic anomaly detection

description: Implement role-based access control engine with hierarchical roles, permission inheritance, and policy evaluation caching.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Hierarchical role structure supported; 2. Permission inheritance from parent roles; 3. Policy evaluation cached in Redis; 4. Admin UI for role management; 5. Audit logging for permission changes

description: Redesign order processing to use event sourcing and CQRS pattern. Implement order state machine with RabbitMQ for async event handling.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Order aggregate with event sourcing implemented; 2. State machine handles: Created, Confirmed, Processing, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled; 3. RabbitMQ consumers process events asynchronously; 4. Order projection updated in read model; 5. Saga pattern handles multi-service transactions

description: Create real-time inventory sync service with multi-warehouse support, stock reservation, and low-stock alerting.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Real-time stock updates via webhooks; 2. Multi-warehouse inventory aggregation; 3. Stock reservation during checkout; 4. Low-stock threshold alerts; 5. Inventory reconciliation job

description: Build shipping carrier integrations for FedEx, UPS, and USPS with rate shopping, label generation, and tracking updates.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Rate shopping across all carriers; 2. Label generation and PDF download; 3. Tracking number retrieval; 4. Webhook-based tracking updates; 5. Carrier-specific error handling

description: Build order notification system for status updates via email and SMS with customizable templates.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Order confirmation email; 2. Shipping notification with tracking; 3. Delivery confirmation; 4. SMS opt-in for updates; 5. Template customization per merchant

description: Implement X12 EDI 837 Professional and Institutional claim parser with validation, error reporting, and claim normalization.
acceptance_criteria: 1. 837P Professional claims parsed correctly; 2. 837I Institutional claims parsed correctly; 3. X12 syntax validation with error codes; 4. Claim data normalized to internal model; 5. Parser handles large batch files

description: Build real-time eligibility verification using X12 270/271 transactions with payer connectivity and response caching.
acceptance_criteria: 1. X12 270 request generation; 2. X12 271 response parsing; 3. Real-time payer connectivity; 4. Response caching with TTL; 5. Eligibility status interpretation

description: Create configurable rules engine for automated claim adjudication with support for coverage rules, deductible tracking, and denial reasons.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Rules DSL for adjudication logic; 2. Coverage determination rules; 3. Deductible and copay calculation; 4. Denial reason code assignment; 5. Rules versioning and audit trail

description: Build Explanation of Benefits document generator with PDF rendering, member-friendly formatting, and multi-language support.
acceptance_criteria: 1. EOB template with required fields; 2. PDF generation with proper formatting; 3. Multi-language support (EN, ES); 4. Accessible PDF for screen readers; 5. Batch EOB generation for print vendor

description: Create member-facing claims dashboard with claim history, status tracking, and EOB download capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Claims list with filtering; 2. Claim detail view; 3. Status timeline display; 4. EOB download link; 5. Appeal initiation workflow

description: Implement Elasticsearch-based provider search with geo-location, specialty filtering, and network tier display.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Full-text search on provider name and specialty; 2. Geo-distance filtering by zip code; 3. Network tier filtering (Tier 1, 2, 3); 4. Accepting new patients filter; 5. Search results pagination

description: Build credentialing workflow engine with document collection, verification steps, and committee review queue.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Credentialing application intake; 2. Document upload and verification; 3. Automated license verification; 4. Committee review queue; 5. Approval/denial notification

description: Create real-time availability calendar with appointment slot management and booking integration.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Weekly calendar view; 2. Real-time slot availability; 3. Booking integration hook; 4. Provider schedule management; 5. Time zone handling

description: Build provider quality metrics display with star ratings, patient satisfaction scores, and clinical quality measures.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Star rating display; 2. Patient satisfaction scores; 3. Clinical quality measures (HEDIS); 4. Comparison to network average; 5. Methodology disclosure

description: Implement email notification channel with SendGrid integration, template rendering, and delivery tracking.
acceptance_criteria: 1. SendGrid API integration; 2. HTML email template rendering; 3. Delivery status tracking; 4. Bounce and complaint handling; 5. Unsubscribe link enforcement

description: Build SMS notification channel with Twilio integration, message segmentation, and opt-out handling.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Twilio API integration; 2. Message segmentation for long content; 3. Delivery receipt tracking; 4. STOP keyword handling; 5. TCPA compliance checks

description: Build template management system with Handlebars rendering, variable substitution, and preview capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Handlebars template syntax; 2. Variable substitution from context; 3. Template versioning; 4. Preview with sample data; 5. Approval workflow for templates

description: Create preference center UI for notification opt-in/opt-out management with channel-specific preferences.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Channel preference toggles; 2. Notification type preferences; 3. Frequency settings; 4. Contact info update; 5. Preference history audit

description: Create drag-and-drop dashboard builder with widget library and layout customization.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Drag-and-drop widget placement; 2. Widget library (charts, tables, KPIs); 3. Layout grid system; 4. Dashboard save and share; 5. Responsive design support

description: Build KPI calculation engine with formula builder, scheduled refresh, and historical trending.
acceptance_criteria: 1. KPI formula builder; 2. Scheduled calculation jobs; 3. Historical data retention; 4. Trend calculation; 5. Alert thresholds

description: Build report generation system with scheduling, multiple output formats, and email distribution.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Report template design; 2. PDF and Excel export; 3. Scheduled report generation; 4. Email distribution list; 5. Report parameter support

description: Build Kafka-based data streaming pipeline for real-time dashboard updates.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Kafka consumer for events; 2. Real-time aggregation; 3. WebSocket push to dashboards; 4. Backpressure handling; 5. Stream recovery on failure
